entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.8°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
